description:
The Commander of the Kamigari mercenary unit "Venus" and a former member of Maken-ki, before it became an all-girls academy. He`s the weakest member of Venus in terms of Element level.
Akaya is a flirt around most of the female cast and he appears to be carefree as he finishes the rumor about someone trying to revive Yamata no Orochwith the words "or so they say" and a dumb smile on his face. It turns out that in reality he is really serious about his work.
name: Kodai Akaya
